name: Wolvenvale League
startIntroPart1: The League of Wolvenvale once began as a simple farm town. Due to the fate of the adventuring warriors known as the Shining Force, Wolvenvale eventually became the capitol of its country via sheer economic power.
startIntroPart2: As time goes on, Wolvenvale's heritage of adventurers continues. How will you fare among the world's stage, as leader of the premier home of adventuring parties?
declaringWar: I am afraid you have forced my hand. I enjoy the thrill of the fight, but I do not enjoy war. So be it. We are ready to destroy your foes. Enjoy your downfall!
attacked: You attack me? Are you mad?
defeated: The tides of battle are not in my favor. Wolvenvale... has fallen. A thousand curses upon your name, and a thousand more upon your people.
introduction: Well met, fellow leader. What say you to a toast to our mutual future?
neutralNo: My people would not agree with such an idea.
I'm sorry, but that isn't possible.
I cannot do so. My apologies.
hateLetsHearIt: I'm in a slight hurry. What are your terms?
hateNo: What sort of fool do you take me for?!
We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Do you feel better now with all that hateful energy gone? Then I propose a toast. To our mutual future, then!
tradeRequest: Friend, I would like to bargain.
